title: Revenge of the buffalo in the land of the holy cow
text:
Why are you talking? Can buffaloes talk? Am I going nuts?
I will answer them one by one. I am talking because someone has to speak for buffaloes. Yes, buffaloes do talk. I am not particularly sure about you, since we’ve just met, but Indians are definitely going nuts.
Are you upset cows are getting all the attention?
I will not qualify that with a response.
You sound like you have been oppressed?
You sound like you were born yesterday. Can you tell the difference between the milk of a cow and a buffalo? Can you tell the difference between our urine and theirs? We produce more dung per capita than cows yet…
I feel your pain.
No you don’t.
What are your political ambitions?
Annihilation of cow.
Do you have a strategy?
Yes. We are talking to Lalit Modi.
Why do you think cows are preferred over you?
Fair skin. There can be no other reason. From Vedic times our output and outlook has remained the same. The cows have forever enjoyed the fair skin advantage. It is in the nature of cows to politicise. They have appropriated all that genuinely belonged to us. We are ready to give up our claims if the cows can prove they are better than us.
Better in what way?
Better citizens, of course.
What is your favourite book?
The Constitution of India.
What do you like about it?
The taste. Makes for a great cud experience. Dung is better and it burns faster, better, causing less pollution.
I thought you read.
Are you stupid? Buffaloes don’t read.
Are you in touch with other buffaloes?
Yes. We are thinking of a mass volunteer-based movement on the lines of the RSS.
Do you really want people to mother worship buffaloes?
No. Not as such. We want equality. We want everything the cow gets. If that means being worshipped, then sure, we want to be worshipped, although we don’t raise the matter internally as it angers the liberal buffaloes.
Do liberal buffaloes exist?
Which world are you from? Yes, liberal buffaloes do exist. Two have served the country as chief ministers too. They are traitors. Cow worshippers.
Where do you get your sense of humour?
From dead cow jokes.
Isn’t that insensitive?
I will not qualify that with a response.
What do you think of the Prime Minister? Do you hold him responsible for what is happening?
No. We do not blame the PM. Our party believes that the PM is not being beefed properly. Once the beefing is accurate, things should change.
You have any message for the men and women of the country?
Sorry. Mann ki baat only on radio.
